resources.string:
Another app is currently using the microphone (e.g., the phone, another tuner, a sound recorder, etc.).\n
\nPlease close the other app then try again.
WPS Tuner requires access to microphone!
This app is not maintained on a regular basis. It is a community driven project and was made with educational purposes. Comme and visit our site. or join the community on our Discord server.
This app was made based on the source code of Noteworthy Tuner by Darshan Computing, LLC. This is the weblink for there app. If you want to original code (in java), this is there GitHub.
This is an open source project. You can get the code (written in Kotlin) on this GitHub repository.

This software is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.\n
\nWhile I do my best to make sure that it works well and does not cause problems, I am not responsible for any damage or inconvenience it may cause under any circumstance.
If you have a question, comment, or want to help/learn, please visit our Discord server.

I\'ve chosen to keep all of these options available to all users for free, without restriction and without ads. Please consider supporting the development of this open source app by purchasing the Pro version of my other app, BatteryBot. (It\'s also open source and ad free!) Thanks!
